```{r }
#Is Mr Darcy the most repeated word Jane Austen's in the Pride and Prejudice?Lets create a word cloud and guage

library(gutenbergr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(wordcloud)

gutenberg_metadata %>%
  filter(title=="Pride and Prejudice")

#1342 is the id, lets download the book

pandp<-gutenberg_download(1342)

words<-pandp %>%
        unnest_tokens(word,text)

word_count<-words %>%
            anti_join(stop_words,by="word") %>%
            count(word,sort=TRUE)


with(word_count,wordcloud(word,n,max=50))

#The answer is an emphatic NO :-)...its elizabeth !!

```
